mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, CANUM, ITEMNUM, TITLE, SUBTITLE, PRICE, GRAM, COUNTRY, EXPIRATION, COUNT, CONTENT, MAINPT, NEWMAINPT, RVCOUNT, RDATE FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY SEQ DESC) AS RNUM, SEQ, CANUM, ITEMNUM, TITLE, SUBTITLE, PRICE, GRAM, COUNTRY, EXPIRATION, COUNT, CONTENT, MAINPT, NEWMAINPT, RVCOUNT, RDATE FROM MARKET ORDER BY SEQ DESC) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 4

SELECT SEQ, NICKNAME, TITLE, LOCATION, KINDS, READCOUNT, MEMBERCOUNT, CONTENT, MEMBERNUM, RDATE, EDATE, CDATE1, CDATE2, CDAY, FILENAME, NEWFILENAME, DEL FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY SEQ DESC) AS RNUM, SEQ, NICKNAME, TITLE, LOCATION, KINDS, READCOUNT, MEMBERCOUNT, CONTENT, MEMBERNUM, RDATE, EDATE, CDATE1, CDATE2, CDAY, FILENAME, NEWFILENAME, DEL FROM COOKCLASS WHERE DEL = 0 AND (MEMBERNUM - MEMBERCOUNT < 3 AND EDATE > SYSDATE) OR (MEMBERCOUNT < MEMBERNUM AND EDATE -SYSDATE < 2 AND EDATE -SYSDATE > -1) ORDER BY SEQ DESC) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 3 AND DEL = 0
